about_the_game:
Get ready to immerse yourself in the world of GRAPPIN with the game's official soundtrack.

Enjoy close to one hour of original music from GRAPPIN, composed by Benoit Malis. The soundtrack features both lush and relaxing tracks, as well as action-packed compositions to set the mood for your journey through the game. Let the music of GRAPPIN transport you to new heights!

name: GRAPPIN Original Soundtrack
short_description: Get ready to immerse yourself in the world of GRAPPIN with the game's official soundtrack. Featuring close to one hour of music composed by Benoit Malis, this collection offers a mix of lush, relaxing tracks and action-packed compositions . Let the music of GRAPPIN transport you to new heights!
